languages.text: This creature gains +100% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and +20% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}. It also gains vampirism and can restore 100% of the damage dealt by {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.
languages.original_text: Это существо получает +100% к {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урону{/g}, +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и +20% к шансу критического {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадания{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}дистанционной{/g} атакой. Оно также обретает способность к вампиризму и восстанавливает 100% от нанесенного атаками {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнего боя{/g} урона в качестве {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}.

It also gains vampirism and can restore 100% of the damage dealt by {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee attacks{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

languages.original_text: This creature gains +100% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and +20% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}. It also gains vampirism and can restore 100% of the damage dealt by {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

languages.text: この生物は{g|Encyclopedia:Range}範囲攻撃{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}+100%、{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}+4、クリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}+20%を得る。また、ヴァンピリズムを得るとともに、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}で受けたダメージの100%を{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}として回復させることができる。
languages.original_text: This creature gains +100% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and +20% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks. It also gains vampirism and can restore 100% of the damage dealt by {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: この生物は{g|Encyclopedia:Range}範囲{/g}攻撃のダメージ100％、{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}4、クリティカルヒット率20％を得る。また、ヴァンピリズムを得るとともに、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近接攻撃{/g}で受けたダメージの100％を{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}として回復させることができる。

languages.text: 此生物造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高100%，{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}提高4点，{g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}远程{/g}攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}暴击率{/g}提高20%。此外，此生物获得吸血效果，每当通过{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}造成伤害时都会恢复{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，等同于造成伤害的100%。
languages.original_text: This creature gains +100% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and +20% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks. It also gains vampirism and can restore 100% of the damage dealt by {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 此生物造成的伤害提高100%，{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}提高4点，远程攻击的暴击率提高20%。{g|Encyclopedia:Range}{/g}此外，此生物获得吸血效果，每当通过{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近战攻击{/g}造成伤害时都会恢复{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，等同于造成伤害的100%。

languages.text: Esta criatura gana +100 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}, +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y +20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}probabilidad de impacto{/g} crítico para sus {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ataques a distancia{/g}. También gana vampirismo y recupera {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} por valor del 100 % del daño de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature gains +100% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and +20% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}. It also gains vampirism and can restore 100% of the damage dealt by {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Esta criatura gana +100 % de daño, +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y +20 % de probabilidad de impacto crítico para sus ataques {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g}. También gana vampirismo y recupera {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} por valor del 100 % del daño de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}.

languages.text: Diese Kreatur erhält +100 % {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}, +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und +20 % kritische {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g} für {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}Fernkampfangriffe{/g}. Sie erhält außerdem Vampirismus und kann 100 % des durch {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriffe{/g} verursachten Schadens als {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} wiederherstellen.
languages.original_text: This creature gains +100% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and +20% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}. It also gains vampirism and can restore 100% of the damage dealt by {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Diese Kreatur erhält +100 % Schaden, +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und +20 % kritische Trefferchance für {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampf{/g}angriffe. Sie erhält außerdem Vampirismus und kann 100 % des durch {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Nahkampfangriffe{/g} verursachten Schadens als {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} wiederherstellen.

languages.text: Cette créature bénéficie de +100 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}, +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et +20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances de coup{/g} critique lors des {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}attaques à distance{/g}. Elle obtient également Vampirisme et peut restaurer 100 % des dégâts infligés par les {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaques de mêlée{/g} sous forme de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature gains +100% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and +20% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}. It also gains vampirism and can restore 100% of the damage dealt by {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cette créature bénéficie de +100 % de dégâts, +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et +20 % de chances d'infliger un coup critique lors des attaques à {g|Encyclopedia:Range}distance{/g}. Elle acquiert également Vampirisme et peut restaurer 100 % des dégâts infligés par les {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}attaques de mêlée{/g} sous forme de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g}.

languages.text: Bu yaratık; {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}menzilli saldırılarında{/g} +%100 daha fazla {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir, +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} ve +%20 kritik {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş olasılığı{/g} kazanır. Ayrıca vampirlik gücü elde eder ve {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırılarıyla{/g} verdiği hasarın %100'ünü {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı olarak geri kazanır.
languages.original_text: This creature gains +100% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and +20% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}. It also gains vampirism and can restore 100% of the damage dealt by {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.
